text: The 2018 ITTF Challenge Series was the second season of the International Table Tennis Federation's secondary professional table tennis tour, a level below the ITTF World Tour. ==Schedule== Below is the schedule released by the ITTF: {| class=wikitable style="font-size:100%" !rowspan=2|Tour !rowspan=2|Event !rowspan=2|Location !rowspan=2|Venue !colspan=2|Date !rowspan=2|Prize money (USD)
